tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ******* *********** ** *** ** *** **** ********* ******* **  ********** We are visiting her from the day we moved to Hyderabad. Due to more people prefer her as the best doctor and wait for her, sometimes we will have to wait for more than 1 hr but most of the time we had to wait for more than 30min. Once my daughter got flu and she treated her like normal patient. while other people were wearing all the safety cloths, she used to come to my daughter's room normally with just a mask and spent plenty of time by playing with her. She even did not care about other's who were told about safety and replied: "She is kid and she has to recover with care". Thank you for all the care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My 5 years old daughter and  2 years of son is getting treated from day one of their birth. We are very happy with her treatment methods. Couple of times had to see other doctors due to her unavailability but none were able to identify and provide treatment so efficiently like Dr. Lakshmi Vedaprakash. Thank you so much Doctor. 
From Naisha n Charvik parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She has a loud tone and didn't listen properly what we said. My daughter had cough and fever for 5 days. She wrote XRay, LFT, CBP, ESR etc. and found nothing. When she saw the xray she realised she found nothing and recommended antibiotics. *** ** **** ***** ** ***** *********** **** ****** ***** *** ******* ** **** ** ****** **** **** * *** *** *** *** ************ ***** ***** ** ******** *** ******* *** ******* ** ** ***** ** *** ********* ** * ****** ****** ***** *** *** ******** *** *** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have decided not to see her again in my lifetime. She has 0 patience, she couldn’t listen to the baby’s problem. We have visited her 2 days continuously ** *** ********* *** ** ****** ** ** ***** She scolded us literally for coming back to back days and quoted “it’s not shopping mall”.  Why would anyone want to see her without any reason and we who have paid 500-600 for 1 min of her time had all the rights to visit till we have validity. 

Worst part is she didn’t even touch my baby girl who was 7months old suffering from stomach ache and diarrhoea but prescribed 7 varieties of tests ( blood., motion, urine test etc). 

We were so pissed off with her attitude and behaviour *** * **** ******* ** ***** *** ** ********** *** **** ***** ***********

Shared my feedback with Rainbow team and I got no response. ******* **** *** *** ******** ** **** ********** *** ** ***** ********** *** ******* **** **** ********* I would not suggest this doctor at all, *** ***** **** **** ******** **** **** ** *** ******

tags: None
review: Highly recommended doctor, ******** ********* *** ***** Only thing is because of more visitors, time taken for consultation is more.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Not recommended. High wait time. No patience to listen to your problems. ***** **** ****** ***********           Hospital maintainence is also not good.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Waiting time is more .. Of course we tried for appointment that doesn't happen.. Consultation fee is bit high

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Friendly behavior, treats very careful and keenly. I strongly support and recommend people to visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She did treat my son good! She gave detailed explanations of things.. checkup was done in a detailed way.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor is so experienced , **** ************* ******* soft speaking, very caring, and listens to us. Tells what are the causes and how to treat.
